The elegant nickel buckle is sleek and adds just a trace of bling that makes all the difference to her ensemble. Perfect for casual attire this XL-sized Hidesign belt brings a new definition to the khaki pants and fitted tank-top. The shiny buckle fitting is another feature that contributes to her overall look. Wear this Hidesign belt and carry off a messy saturday look with style.
